full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SMAN GYI BLA BEE d'URYA'I 'OD KYI RGYAL PO MCHED BDUN THUB PA'I DBANG PO DANG BCAS PA BSGRUB PA'I MCHOD PA MDOR BSDUS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES SMAN GYI BLA BEE d'URYA'I 'OD KYI RGYAL PO MCHED BDUN THUB PA'I DBANG PO DANG BCAS PA BSGRUB PA'I MCHOD PA MDOR BSDUS PA 'DI NI 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA CHEN PO'I ZHE HOR GYI PHO BRANG GI GTZUG LAG @004B KHANG DU 'KHOD PA'I THER GUN T'A BLA MA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSAM 'GRUB KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, HA CANG BSDUS PA'I LUGS 'DI SLA CHOS SU 'GRO BAR SNANG YANG, BSKUL BA PO'I BLO DO DANG BSTUN, RJE CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN RAB KUN GZIGS LNGA PA CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I CHO GA RNAMS LAS LA SNYING POR BSDUS TE SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI KE 'KHOR GSOL DPON BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GO, ,DGE'O, ,) 'JAM DBYANGS DNGOS BRGYUD BLA MA DANG, BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD DANG DAM CHOS DGE 'DUN LA, PHYAG 'TSAL MCHOD 'BUL SDIG BSHAGS RJES YI RANG, BSKUL GSOL DGE TSOGS BYANG CHUB CHEN POR BSNGO, RMONGS CHEN BDAG GI TSUL MIN BYA BA KUN, DMIGS MED @005A *, ,THUGS RJE'I DAD NAS BZOD PAR GSOL, DGE 'DIS BSTAN DANG 'GRO BA'I BDE SKYED SPEL, RGYUR BSNGO BDAG GZHAN DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB SHOG ,MCHOG SPRIN KHA GDAN LHA TSOGS RIM MER ZHU, BDAG SNYING GNYUG SEMS DBYER MED BTAN PAR BZHUGS, MCHOG GSUM DPAL SNANG RGYAS BYED BKRA SHIS SHOG ,(CES PA 'DI DGE SLONG DAR RGYAS SO,, ,,)
